content.question: A person whose height is <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> feet is walking away from the base of a streetlight along a straight road, as shown in the figure above. The height of the streetlight is <math alttext="L" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> feet. At time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> seconds, the person is <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> feet from the streetlight, and the length of the person's shadow is <math alttext="s" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> feet. The quantities are related by the equation <math alttext="the fraction 1 over L, end fraction, times, open parenthesis, x plus s, close parenthesis, equals, the fraction 1 over M, end fraction, times s" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="L" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are constants. Which of the following best describes the relationship between the rate of change of <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with respect to time and the rate of change of <math alttext="s" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with respect to time?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of x, with respect to t, equals, the fraction L over M, end fraction, times s, minus s" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi>s</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
